messages.body:
morgan1948@live.com



12/5/2010 


Atten.Miss.Mrs.Esther Summerson,


I am Mr.Kelvin Morgan I am a US citizen, 48 years Old. My residential address is as follows. 5424 Pentridge Street  Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, 19143-4126, United States, I am one of those that took part in the Compensation in Nigeria many years ago and they refused to pay me, I had paid over $275,000 while in the US, trying to get my payment all to no avail.


So I decided to travel to WASHINGTON D.C with all my compensation documents, And I was directed by the ( F B I) Director to contact , who is a representative of the ( F B I ) and a member of the WORLD BANK AFRICAN PALIARMENT REGION AWARD COMMITTEE, currently in Nigeria.and I contacted him and he explained everything to me. He said whoever is contacting us through any Banks in Nigeria are fake.


He took me to the paying bank which is World Bank for the claim of my payment. Right now I am the most happiest man on earth because I have received my compensation funds of $18.5 Million Us Dollars Moreover, , showed me the full information of those that are yet to receive their payments and I saw your name as one of the beneficiaries, and your email address, that is why I decided to email you to stop dealing with those people, they are not with your fund, they are only making money out of you. I will advise you to contact . 


You have to contact him directly on this information below. 


WORLD BANK COMPENSATION AWARD HOUSE/AFRICAN REGION
Name : 
Email: panafricaparliament@live.com
Telephone Number:234-704-1689799


You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting you and telling you that your fund is with them, it is not in anyway with them, they are only taking advantage of you and they will dry you up until you have nothing.


The only money I paid after I met  was just $490 for the Transfer Charge (COT), take note of that.


Once again stop contacting those people, I will advise you to contact  so that he can help you to Deliver your fund instead of dealing with those liars that will be turning you around asking for different kind of money to complete your transaction.


Thank You and Be Blessed.


Mr.Kelvin Morgan
5424 Pentridge 
Street Philadelphia, 
Tel: 1-409-3566908
Fax: 1-425-955-1837

My name is Conversation Kenge.  I am with the firm of Dewey, Cheatham and Howe in London.  I am the executor of Ms Summerson's estate.   Any correspondence concerning Ms Summerson is to be sent to my assistant, Anita Kopper, addressed thusly:


Anita Kopper
Dewey, Cheatham and Howe
72, Earls Court Road
London W8
UK


Thank you,

 
Kenge.

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Morgan:


Our firm does not conduct business of this magnitude over the telephone.   I am certain that you are in a position to advise  of our address, and of our intention not to proceed without examining the documents.  The post works very well in London and we will look forward to receiving copies of the documents by that means.


Thank you for your attention in this matter,

 
Anita Kopper
messages.raw:
Anita Kopper

Sent: 12/13/2010

I am certain that you are in a position to advise Mr. Ubah of our address, and of our intention not to proceed without examining the documents. The post works very well in London and we will look forward to receiving copies of the documents by that means.

Thank you for your attention in this matter,

Anita Kopper
